    • Method Detail

      • computeRootedCompilationUnits

        protected Target.RootedCompilationUnits computeRootedCompilationUnits()
                                                               throws InterruptedException
        Description copied from class: Target
        Computes the set of compilation units that root the dependency walk. The returned set of compilation units and their dependencies will be compiled.
        Overrides:
        computeRootedCompilationUnits in class JSTarget
        Returns:
        The set of rooted ICompilationUnit's.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
